venue.name: Waltham, MA at the Forefront Conference Center

item.description:
The second annual bSa BIMSmart Summit is coming to Waltham!
This event will sell out! Some of the top National and International BIM implementers are scheduled to attend. Attendees from Finland, Germany, Denmark, Canada and across the US are already confirmed.

Cost: $75.00 members of bSa
$150.00 non-members* (All non-members will receive a complimentary membership with the bSa. Value $75.00) All monies collected through National.

Lunch is included. We will have a panel discussions and presentations on the state of BIM in US and abroad, COBie, BIM & Laser scanning, BIM & Insurance, and a working BIM Process / Implementation Charette to name a few.

FM Global, Stiles Construction, BR+A, ACAI Technologies and Precision Point are Sponsors.

For more information or to register, go to:

http://www.buildingsmartusa.com
item.name: 2nd Annual bSa BIMSmart Summit
